title: Save $1,000 Off Move-In*
posting_body: ['Save $1,000 Off Move-In*', '*Offer applies to select 2-bedroom units on a 12-month lease.', 'Must move in by 8/13/2022', 'Welcome to Valley Plaza Apartment Homes!', "At Valley Plaza you'll have endless activities to explore.", 'Swim in our heated saltwater pool, play tennis on one of two courts, have a BBQ in our shaded picnic area, or workout in our state of the art gym.', '- In-Unit Washer & Dryer in all Apartments', '- We offer 3M -12M Leases, Month-to-Month after 1 Year', '- $0 Deposit Community', '- Microwave', '- Dishwasher', '- Separate Dining Area', '- Large Closet', '- Spacious Floorplans', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Private Balcony', '- Pet Friendly', '- BBQ/Picnic Area', '- Swimming Pool', '- Close to Shopping', '- Close to Restaurants', '- Close to Freeway', '- Close to Schools', '- Walking distance to historical Downtown', '- Near major Tri-Valley employment centers', '- Ice makers', '- Conveniently located near major retailers/shopping', '- Granite counter tops', '- Microwaves', '- Vaulted ceilings', '- Lush landscaping', '- Short-term leases available (additional fees may apply for shorter terms)', '- His & her dry sauna', '- Assigned covered parking', '- Heated pool with sun deck', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing is subject to change.', 'Call for details.', 'Property Code VP:ESR0377']
